programme.title: The Cobbler
programme.desc: A cobbler, bored of his everyday life, stumbles upon a magical heirloom that allows him to become other people and see the world in a different way.

programme.title: Metallica: S&M2
programme.desc: Filmed over the two sold-out shows that opened the new Chase Center arena in San Francisco, S&M2 sees Metallica joining forces with the nearly 80 member San Francisco Symphony, led by conductor Edwin Outwater, with a special appearance by legendary conductor and long-time San Francisco Symphony Musical Director Michael Tilson Thomas. The shows marked the first time since the original S&M performances in 1999 (documented in the Grammy-winning live album and concert film, S&M).

programme.title: Planet Action S3
programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced 25min evergreen series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, extraordinary stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters. We'll take you behind the scenes of the best action movies released.

programme.title: Chris Packham's Animal Einsteins
programme.desc: Chris Packham investigates how nature's masterminds measure up against human brain power. Looking at a variety of animals, such as ravens, crows, bees and starlings, Chris explores how different animals can use tools, solve complex puzzles, recognise themselves in mirrors and even reason like humans.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Zoom, Zim, Zam
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday.

programme.title: Hiccup & Sneeze
programme.desc: After watching one of Ellard's videos about dress-up parties, Hiccup and Sneeze tell Bibi that they want to have one too. However, they can't agree on whether they should have a pirate themed party or a circus themed party.

programme.title: Kit n Kate S1
programme.desc: Two small kitties named Kit and Kate love their toy box. As soon as they hop inside, magic starts to happen. Kid's imagination transforms their room into a blueberry island, race track or a medieval castle. Every time the kitties create a whole new world with amazing discoveries, surprises and not-so-easy-to-solve dilemmas.

programme.title: The Fixies S3
programme.desc: The Fixies follows the comical misadventures of Tom Thomas and his secret friendship with Simka and Nolik, the children of the Fixie family that lives in his apartment. There's just no end to the troubles Tom Thomas and his Fixie friends get themselves into with all the gadgets and appliances around them! Luckily for Tom Thomas, the Fixies have the smarts, skills, and tools they need to figure out a problem and solve it before his parents find out.

programme.title: Ricky Zoom S1
programme.desc: Little red rescue motorbike Ricky Zoom, along with his loyal and enthusiastic bike buddies Loop, Scootio and DJ, race around the sports track, try new stunts at the park, and zoom into adventures.

programme.title: Tayo The Little Bus S1
programme.desc: The adventures of Tayo, a blue bus with the number 120. He is very playful and mischievous with his passengers and his friends.

programme.desc: The adventures of Tayo, a blue bus with the number 120. He is very playful and mischievous with his passengers and his friends.

programme.title: Pinkfong Wonderstar
programme.desc: Pinkfong crashes into the roof of a house, and in doing so, finds a best friend and problem-solving partner named Hogi. Pinkfong has the power to make wishes a reality, and Hogi has gained a lot of knowledge through reading. This inspires them to form Wonderstar', a problem-solving team that serves the townspeople of Wonderville - and beyond!

programme.title: Rainbow Rangers S2
programme.desc: The Rangers have to stop a factory from dying a river rainbow! / The Rangers help a handicapped-duckling fly to catch up with its migrating flock.

programme.title: Petronix Defenders
programme.desc: When crises strike wild animals around the planet, a team of heroic seven-year-olds transform their high-tech backpacks into robotic pets and rush off on daring missions to rescue them. This team of heroic kids and their robotic pets stands on call, ready to leap into action when danger strikes animals around the world.

programme.title: Pokemon Master Journeys: The Series S24
programme.desc: It's a big, big world, but you know where to find Ash and Goh---battling and catching Pokemon from Kanto to Galar! With Pikachu, Cinderace, and their other Pokemon beside them, our heroes continue to travel all over the world to research Pokemon for Cerise Laboratory.

programme.title: Puberteens
programme.desc: Celeste is determined to be the perfect gymnast by mastering the extremely difficult move, "The Pretzel". However, her journey to perfection soon takes a dangerous twist.

programme.title: Puberteens
programme.desc: Mike is embarrassed about crying in public after watching a film. With the help of Celeste, Hiro, and a froggy companion, Mike embarks on a mission to "man up". Will Mike ever be tough enough?

programme.title: Tara Duncan
programme.desc: Tara Duncan is about an ordinary girl from earth who arrives on the magical planet OtherWorld to learn how to manage her uncontrollable powers and protect her family. There she must count on her new friends to solve mysteries and face evil forces.

programme.title: Tara Duncan

programme.title: OddBods S3
programme.desc: The OddBods return for a new season of fun and laughter!

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger: S2 Spinoff
programme.desc: Zari thinks that she has spotted a snake that can teleport, but it turns out that the snake has another interesting ability. The rangers uses the snake's special skill to get it to safety.

programme.title: 44 Cats - First Series
programme.desc: Lampo dreams to join the Meow Meow Grand Prix, the biggest motorbike race in town. The only problem is, he doesn't have a bike! Luckily, the mechanic cat Wrench is there to help him, building him a special bike that feeds on snacks! Will Lampo finally beat Boss, Winston's tricky cat, and win the race with his greedy bike?

programme.title: Tales From Sanctuary City - Combat Wombat
programme.desc: Lazy wombat Maggie Diggins becomes Combat Wombat, Sanctuary City's new superhero after she begrudgingly saves a citizen from falling to his death. However, her rising stardom displeases local superhero Flightless Feather, who hatches a plan for Maggie's demise. But in the process, Maggie uncovers a conspiracy that could put the city in grave danger, and it is up to her to expose it!

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S2
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a demonstration of balloon modelling on TV. He decides to make a balloon poodle to offer the she-bear he's enamored with. By observing Grizzy, the Lemmings discover with enthusiasm that you can blow up modelling balloons far more than regular ones, and that they end up exploding in a shower of tattered strips.

programme.title: Mandy And Her Mighty Adventures S2
Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: The Garden Gurus: Garden Revolution
programme.desc: The show takes on very practical, everyday gardening challenges and solves them. It showcases the innovation the garden industry introduces to help make gardening easier, and more fun.

programme.title: Atlantic: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: The Atlantic Ocean is vast, wild and unforgiving. Stretching from the Antarctic in the south, to the Arctic in the north, the Americas in the west to Africa and Europe in the east, it covers 20% of the Earth's surface. It's irresistible power shapes lands with its unstoppable force. Each episode documents a different season in and around the Atlantic, through the lives of the animals that live there. Every season brings new challenges.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains newfound, spider-like powers and ventures out to save the city from the machinations of a mysterious reptilian foe.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: World's Wildest Weather S1
programme.desc: From freak tornadoes appearing out of nowhere, to pounding storms with hailstones the size of footballs... this fast-paced, adrenaline-filled, and shocking documentary series charts some of the most extreme weather from around the globe. Mixing first-person witness statements, expert commentary, user-generated content, CGI and science, it's a memorable examination of some of the wildest weather systems ever seen.

programme.title: Umma
programme.desc: Amanda and her daughter live a quiet life on an American farm, but when the remains of her estranged mother arrive from Korea, Amanda becomes haunted by the fear of turning into her own mother.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone S1
programme.desc: An updated version of the classic anthology series featuring various tales of science fiction, mystery, and horror. A woman sets out to prevent a racist state trooper from killing her son by using a camcorder with the power to turn back time.

programme.title: Dogmatix And The Indomitables
programme.desc: Dogmatix leads a gang of animal friends, the Indomitables, living in Lutetia (Paris in the Ancient World), who have to battle it out with the Romans (who insist on imposing their way of life on the Gaulish people). With its fast-paced high jinks, high-speed chases and a touch of magic, Dogmatix and the Indomitables will provide great fun and adventures for all!

programme.title: The Great Warrior Wall
programme.desc: This exciting series follows the life of Seya Wolf on his quest to become a hero. On his way, he encounters friends that accompany him on his journey, and foes who force him into battles.

programme.title: Totally Totto
programme.desc: Isaac Ng has never been good in science, and gets bored in class easily. He wishes he could develop a passion for it, just like his scientist father. Little does he know he's about to get what he wished for – in the form of Totto, a genius bunny who takes him on many fun and crazy adventures in science! Totally Totto is a live action series with an adorable puppet and animation-filled segments that brings science to your fingertips.

programme.title: Lil Wild
programme.desc: It's the 42nd annual Zoolympics and Kokeko's competitive nature gets the better of her! Meanwhile, Rara gets jealous when Wobi pays more attention to a caterpillar than her!

programme.title: Early Man
programme.desc: Set at the dawn of time, when prehistoric creatures and woolly mammoths roamed the earth, Early Man tells the story of Dug, along with sidekick Hognob as they unite his tribe against a mighty enemy Lord Nooth and his Bronze Age City to save their home.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S2
programme.desc: Grizzy is awakened from his nap by the unpleasant, ongoing sound of Velcro strips being ripped off. The Lemmings have covered their bodies in Velcro and are throwing themselves against a doormat, which serves as their target. Grizzy finds peace and quiet by getting rid of the doormat until the Lemmings realize that bear fur is an ideal support for Velcro.

programme.title: Double Chin S2
programme.desc: Sazali has been spared any tricks from Zero. Flora in the meantime, has been spending time with the coach, much to Sazali's annoyance. Sazali too yearns for soccer instead of basketball.

programme.title: MasterChef Singapore S3
programme.desc: Top brass from DBS bank visits the MasterChef Kitchen and highlights the environmental havoc caused by food waste. To encourage zero waste cooking, they offer a cash prize to the home cook who can create the most delicious dish with food scraps rescued from restaurant waste bins. The bottom six are then thrown a curve ball through a Hidden Pairs challenge. Guest Chef Nurul tests the contestants with ten of the strangest ingredient pairings you could ever imagine.

programme.title: Expedition With Steve Backshall S1
programme.desc: In this truly global series, three-time BAFTA-winning adventurer and wildlife expert, Steve Backshall ventures into uncharted territory in pursuit of new discoveries and world firsts. On 10 unique journeys, Steve scales unclimbed peaks, uncovers life unknown to science, meets local people and shines light into caves that have been dark for millions of years. Shot in stunning 4K, this is a beautifully filmed journey into the unknown.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond The Lobby S1
programme.desc: In the first episode of this eye-opening series, Giles Coren and Monica Galetti join the 9,500-strong workforce in one of the world's biggest hotels - Singapore's Marina Bay Sands. This epic hotel caters for one million guests every year, cost 3.5 billion to build and was created as part of a government plan to triple tourist income to Singapore within ten years. The jewel in its crown is the longest elevated infinity pool in the world, the size of three Olympic swimming pools.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst Rise (S4)
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Malay) Legendary Blader Valt Aoi has been training the next generation of elite Bladers at Spain's BC Sol. One day, rookie Bladers Dante Koryu and Delta Zakuro witness Valt unleashing his newly evolved Gamma Bey, Sword Valtryek. To their surprise, Valtryek radiates a golden light as it rockets around the stadium. Inspired by the limitless possibilities of this "Hyper-Flux" state, both Dante and Delta seek the same bond with their Beys.

programme.desc: (Encore) Sashimi offers a plethora of health benefits, but ingesting a slice with a pesky parasite could lead to days of illness. Just how safe is raw fish in Singapore?

Zul is troubled to learn that Vanessa has not told her new employers of her medical history. programme.title: Deals For Joy
programme.desc: Discover how you can wake up every morning glowing and refreshed as our hosts prove how a comfortable pillow is key for a good nights's sleep.

programme.desc: We kick off the show in Brisbane checking out a trendy new hotspot and home, We get kitchen and recipe tips from Adam, and at the climax we see a coastal home on the sunshine coast.

programme.title: The Wall UK S4
programme.desc: The Wall is a wildly unpredictable, fast and simple game show with huge cash sums on the line. Two players must work together to tackle the mammoth four-storey-high wall. Emotions run high as the pair's faith in one another is tested by unpredictable outcomes and ever-rising stakes. The rules are simple. If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

programme.desc: (重)《三男一旅》大队离开云南省，从成都机场驱车一路向西挺进！作为《三男一旅》这趟旅程的最后一站，三位主持人郑斌辉、苏梽诚和黄靖伦，将在位于海拔3730公尺的康定县塔公草原上，迎来跟什么主题相关的任务和挑战呢？.

programme.title: 一人行。暖人心
programme.desc: (重) 一人行，暖人心说的是一对新加坡夫妇爱心点灯的故事。这对夫妻10年前放下高薪的工作、舒服的生活，带着两个孩子搬到云南走进中国落后又偏远的村庄，靠着自己的能力，帮助当地的少数民族解决生计问题。他们除了教导村民做手工艺品，还帮忙建学校、教学生英语，改善整个村子的环境和设施，也改变了村民的生活素质。.

programme.title: 爱情是Beautiful, 人生是Wonderful
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 文俊益回心转意，向俊辉要监视器画面，表示想调查真相，以免白霖被冤枉。.

programme.title: 沙风暴
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/泰) 律师宣布纳霖不在公司期间，芙纳拉将由婉欣夫人、纳瑞和小莎共同管理。印堤不服气并决定先处理掉小莎。.

programme.title: 第二任丈夫
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 在景翻找善花的物品，意外发现遗物盒，因此得知善花就是海兰的女儿。在景不动声色地拔了善花的头发去做亲子鉴定，等确认善花的身世后，决心要阻拦善花和海兰相认。.

programme.title: 第二任丈夫
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 在景生怕海兰发现善花的身份，偷偷找崔恩洁冒充海兰的女儿。尹会长很快就查出恩洁是假冒的女儿，却没向妻子说明真相。.

programme.title: ila 部落住一晚 S2
programme.desc: (PG) 这一集，民雄将带着世界羽球球后戴资颖，以及她的冠军教练团一起快乐游茂林啰～这趟旅行的第一天，他们将到访两台湾唯一三星级生态景观“茂林紫蝶幽谷”寻找四种紫斑蝶，冲进得恩谷的天然划水道享受炎夏的清凉！再跟着当地专家夜探自然生态！ (听说小戴发现台湾斑龟) 。第二天再去认识台湾唯一国定万山岩雕遗址，走访东南亚最高的吊桥看周边大自然美景，并热热闹闹的大逛多纳市集，吃遍茂林区的美食小吃！除了这些，还有小戴及教练群们温暖的对话，以及被民雄大哥逗到笑歪了的笑容！.

programme.title: 异搜店
programme.desc: (PG13-部分画面令人不安) 韩升和子晴来医院探望少娣，德信带着公鸡像也来了。.

programme.title: Baba Papa The Series
programme.desc: Liana is distrubed by the fact that Izzaty is constantly speaking English to her son Irfan. programme.title: Baba Papa The Series
